languages.text: While the Commissar is adjacent to an enemy, all their allies gain +{uip|Resolve|d61fbaba9fe34b6697efe57f3c5e8574} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange sich der Kommissar neben einem Gegner befindet, erhalten alle seine Verbündeten +{uip|Resolve|d61fbaba9fe34b6697efe57f3c5e8574} Entschlossenheit.

languages.text: Komiser, bir düşmanın bitişiğindeyken tüm dost birimleri +{uip|Resolve|d61fbaba9fe34b6697efe57f3c5e8574} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazanır.

languages.text:
While the Commissar is adjacent to an enemy, all their allies gain {uip|Resolve|d61fbaba9fe34b6697efe57f3c5e8574} resolve.
If there are no creatures in the 2-cell radius around the Commissar, they receive {uip|Resolve|d61fbaba9fe34b6697efe57f3c5e8574} resolve themselves.
